recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti al dente
2. Fry pancetta with garlic
3. Mix eggs and parmesan
4. Combine all ingredients off heat
5. Season with black pepper

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
2. Grill chicken pieces
3. Make sauce with onions, tomatoes and spices
4. Simmer chicken in sauce
5. Finish with cream

recipes.name: Beef Bourguignon
recipes.instructions:
1. Brown beef and bacon
2. Sauté vegetables
3. Deglaze with wine
4. Slow cook with herbs
5. Reduce sauce

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop all vegetables
2. Heat wok with oil
3. Stir fry garlic and ginger
4. Add vegetables
5. Season with soy sauce

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.instructions:

2. Add olives and feta
3. Dress with oil and herbs

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.instructions:

recipes.instructions:

recipes.name: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.instructions:
